name: APITemplate.io Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 APITemplate.io Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the APITemplate.io API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the APITemplate.io API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: image

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get | (必填项)

imageTemplateId.name: imageTemplateId
imageTemplateId.description: ID of the image template to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
imageTemplateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name or ID | 作用: ID of the image template to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

pdfTemplateId.name: pdfTemplateId
pdfTemplateId.description: ID of the PDF template to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
pdfTemplateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name or ID | 作用: ID of the PDF template to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

download.name: download
download.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download | 作用: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file | 默认值: False

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

overridesUi.name: overridesUi
overridesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Overrides | 默认值: {}

propertiesUi.name: propertiesUi
propertiesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Properties | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - The name of the downloaded image/pdf. It has to include the extension. For example: report.pdf
